name: KABUL
description:
The first game McBurrobit ever worked on, borne out of frustration at work and the desire to create, it's a very simple arcade game with some bad design choices, but there are some ideas in there that, with a little refinement, might one day make for a fun little game.

Controls

Up and Down arrows to manouver, Spacebar to bank current score and reset the tunnel. Hitting the wall resets the multiplier, so there's a factor of risk management (should I bank my score early or go on for longer?).
